long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an "Learning AI Extension" which helps users understand AI and learn how to do Machine Learning projects in Microsoft Azure ML Studio.

Users will access to 1) Lessons explaining the concept of AI and Machine Learning, explaining the learning examples, and explaining how to work within this extension, 2) Labs as the step-by-step guideline, and 3) Hints as a practical guide to the practical levels.
